thread.title: Trump Brings Republicans to Moment of Truth on Trade

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: Trump Brings Republicans to Moment of Truth on Trade

organizations.name: trump brings republicans to moment of truth

text:
As President Donald Trump prepares to impose hefty tariffs on imported aluminum and steel, there are two important things to remember: First, this is a moment of truth for the Republican party on economic policy.
Second, it was inevitable.
From the beginning, the Trump administration has represented an attempt to weld together establishment... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
